constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 95 (Tuesday, June 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SIRES:
H.R. 3679.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to clause 3(d)(1) of rule XIII of the Rules of the
House of Representatives, the Committee finds the authority
for this legislatioin in article I, section 8 of the
Constitution
[Page H2686]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Collaborative Academic Research Efforts for Tourette Syndrome Act of 2021
